entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
